alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grand County through 315 PM MDT... At 245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northwest of Moab, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Grand County, including the following locations... Arches National Park and Cisco. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 188 and 213. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 136 and 155. Utah 128 between mile markers 26 and 44. Utah 313 between mile markers 17 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
